tool_description: is a climate change news api, you can read news from all over the world about this subject.
name: climachangeapi
title: climachangeapi

api_list.name: Get individual News Source
api_list.description: Get news about climate change from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climachangeapi.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climachangeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climachangeapi.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climachangeapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all climate change news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world.
